disclosures.entity: Pacific Friends of the Global Fund and the Asia Pacific Leaders Malaria Alliance (APLMA)
disclosures.details: In May 2017, I received an invitation to visit Thailand and Myanmar as part of a delegation of nine Members and Senators between Saturday 24 June and Saturday 1 July 2017. The entire costs of this visit were $7,635.11, which were met by APLMA which is supported by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation.

On 1st and 3rd of December 2017, a Rex return flight between Canberra and Tamworth was donated to the Nationals Party during the New England by-election. I was on that flight with other Nationals Members and Senators. The individual estimated cost was $500.00.
On 13 October 2017, I bought a part share in various horses at the value of $4,500.00.
Concert Tickets: 2 x Tickets to 'The Killers' in Melbourne on May 5th 2018
Membership (Provisional)(Paid)
Minor Share in Racehorse Syndicate
In August 2018 I travelled to Bangladesh to inspect Australia Aid program with Save The Children organisation. This trip was for 4 nights and 3 days.
As listed in earlier declarations I have purchased various part shares in horses from October 2017 until recently and I now have a small share in 3 horses.
In October 2018 I travelled to Afghanistan as part of the Australian Defence Force Parliamentary Program from 2 - 14 October 2018.
In January 2019 I and my partner attended the Australia Open as guests of The Australia Open.
